Class Item

  • Object
    • Item
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AlaCarte, SetPackage

    public class Item
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Stores information about an item of a Menu, AlaCarte and SetPackage.
    Author:
    Liu Liling
    See Also:
    Serializable, Serialized Form
